_ VIP member nih ve i duh chuan fee hi i pek a ngaia, i pek hmaa i tih tur : Kan plan-te khu en la, i duh ber select rawh, id ka lo pek hunah che Creator tih button khu hmet la, i ID leh i fee pek tur zat va thawn ang che...

*English :*
To become a VIP member, you need to pay a fee. Before paying, you must review one requirement. See our plan by clicking the button below, choose your preferred option, and I will provide your ID. Then, click the Creator button below, enter your ID, and specify the amount you wish to pay
